feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon then to rain this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
